alert.note: Alert for Graham; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Norton and northeastern Graham Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Edmond, or 16 miles north of Hill City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nicodemus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Kansas.
